author: Dan Frosch, Deanna Paul, Ian Lovett
title: Slow Start for Rapid Tests Frustrates States...
description: Slow Start for Rapid Tests Frustrates States... (First column, 7th story, link ) Related stories: USA TODAY: Golf, handshakes and Mar-a-Lago conga line; Squandered week highlights President's lack of COVID-19 focus... Trump Congratulates Himself 116 Times for…
content:
A rapid test for the new coronavirus that was touted by the White House as a game-changing development has proved vexing for state officials, who say the federal government has failed to provide enough necessary equipment.
